questions.question_text:
You have an SAP HANA virtual machine that performs daily backups to an Azure Storage account container.

You need to automatically delete backups that are older than 30 days.

Which type of policy should you create?

HOTSPOT
-

You have an Azure subscription.

You plan to deploy an SAP landscape.

You need to configure an NFS cluster that will host the storage for the landscape. The solution must ensure that the cluster is available if an Azure datacentre fails.

How should you configure the cluster? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
For Availability Zone Network Resiliency, Load Balancer is a better option as its zone redundant, ensuring high availability across availability zones....

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/guide/technology-choices/load-balancing-overview

However, it also supports both a regional deployment topology and a cross-region Load Balancer topology.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/load-balancer/cross-region-overview

comments.content:
And also :
You can't SPLIT, merge, or update reservation scope.

discussion.content:
Instance size flexibility isn't supported for HLI reserved capacity. A reservation applies only to the SKU and the region that you purchase it for.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cost-management-billing/reservations/prepay-hana-large-instances-reserved-capacity

choices.B: a one-year reservation that has capacity priority
choices.D: a one-year reservation that has instance size flexibility
choices.C: a three-year reservation that has instance size flexibility

questions.question_text:
You migrate an on-premises instance of SAP HANA to HANA on Azure (Large Instances).

You project that you will replace HANA Large Instances with two smaller instances in two years.

You need to recommend a solution to minimize SAP HANA costs for the next three years.

What should you include in the recommendation?

You have an SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) deployment that has two Type II SKU nodes. Each node is provisioned in a separate Azure region.

You need to monitor storage replication for the deployment.

What should you use?

discussion.content:
The answer is correct, based on the steps given on the link below

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/windows/change-availability-set

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

You have an Azure subscription that contains an availability set named AS1 and a virtual machine named VM1. VM1 hosts an SAP NetWeaver application.

You need to ensure that AS1 includes VM1.

Which four PowerShell cmdlets should you run in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.

//IMG//
